title: Captured at Nightfall
description: Allison Young has never had a chance to fall in love, but after years of taking on responsibilities way beyond her age, she is finally moving away from home to attend college and just be . . . a twenty-four-year-old girl. Someone crazy and spur of the moment.When her very best friend Lainie drags her to an underground MMA fight club, Allie knows it’s exactly what she’s craving from her new independence. The first of many-to-come exploits.What she doesn’t plan on is the rough-talking, hot-blooded warrior who instantly captures her heart. Allie is helpless to resist the powerful magnetism and piercing green gaze of Matthew Lynch.An ex-Navy SEAL, Matthew has spent years dealing death among the shadows. But now he battles terrifying memories and an overwhelming guilt that has drawn him into a life of isolation and self-loathing. Their connection is immediate and passionate, but will Allie’s quiet strength and independence be enough to help Matthew confront his darkest demons? A novel of love, friendship, and self-discovery, Captured at Nightfall will leave you breathless and longing for more . . .Follow Kitrisha on Facebook or at www.KitrishaRasmussen.com
author: Kitrisha Rasmussen
